Openlabs.Mgcxm.Net.MgcxmSocketConnectionHandler Class Reference Openlabs.Mgcxm.Net.MgcxmSocketConnectionHandler
Represents an abstract base class for handling WebSocket connections and events.
Inheritance diagram for Openlabs.Mgcxm.Net.MgcxmSocketConnectionHandler:
Public Member Functions
abstract void OnConnection (MgcxmSocket socket)
Invoked when a WebSocket connection is established.
abstract void OnMessage (byte[] data)
Invoked when a message is received over the WebSocket connection.
abstract void OnDisconnection (WebSocketCloseStatus? status)
Invoked when the WebSocket connection is closed.
Properties
MgcxmSocket Socket [get]
Gets the MgcxmSocket representing the current WebSocket connection.
Detailed Description
Represents an abstract base class for handling WebSocket connections and events.
